ygData.subject: Re: Spells in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: The Root and Gate spell can both be found at the Clerics Guild in North Freeport.  Not sure why they aren t available at the Wizards guild, but there you have
ygData.messageBody:
The Root and Gate spell can both be found at the Clerics Guild in North
Freeport. Not sure why they aren't available at the Wizards guild, but
there you have it ;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Billy Sun <bsun@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 12:05 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Spells in Freeport


> From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
>
> I specifically look for ROOT and GATE spell. Somehow they don't carry
them.
>
